data.content:
(kỹ thuật)
kiểm tra quản l

noun
plural -dits
a complete and careful examination of the financial records of a business or person [count]
The audit showed that the company had mislead investors.
The Internal Revenue Service selected us for an audit. [noncount]
You will need all your records if you are selected for audit by the IRS.
[count] :a careful check or review of something
Our local power company will perform an energy audit [=survey, inspection] of our house.
Investigators called for an audit [=review, analysis] of flight safety standards.
verb
-dits; -dited; -diting
[+ obj] to check the financial records of (a business or person) :to perform an audit on (a business or person)
They audit the company books every year.
The Internal Revenue Service audited him twice in 10 years.
US :to attend a course at a college or university without having to do any of the course work and without receiving credit
I audited an English literature class last semester.
